title: 又係我 每日一篇 ielt writing

replies.msg:
內文可能令你心煩氣燥 如有不適請留下負評並按下上一頁

小弟一直有寫作困難 學左10幾年英文仍然苦無進步 但我不甘於此 希望有高人指點指點

Q: Some people think women should be allowed to join the army, the navy and the air force just like men. To what extent do you agree or disagree.

Ans:

Nowadays, gender equality is a suggested universal value; hence, some individuals believe that the female also should have right to participate in national security. In my opinion, women should have the same right as the male joining the military if they can fulfill physical and intellectual requirements.

To be a soldier, it requires a high standard of physical strength. In term of biological views, men are always stronger than women because of more muscular fibers. In other words, the male can lift up heavier objects and well adapt to vigorous exercises. However, humans are various from one to each other. There are still some women who are extremely gifted in sports and possess strong bodies allowing them to endure densely military training. Opting out the whole women from servicing in the army is an unfair choice.

Beside physical conditions, psychological stability should be considered too. Being the navy or the air force soldiers, it requires a calm mind to handle any sudden situation. In a certain extent, women always perform better in emergency incidents. For example, nurses frequently have to face patients who become worse instantly and make a wise decision under this circumstance. The major gender of nurses is female. This shows the female is also capable to deal with changing situations during battles.

Gender should not be a boundary to hinder people from chasing their dreams. The society should treat equally women and men in recruitment. More importantly, this benefits the country raising labor forces because women can contribute to the society in a broader way.

258 Words
35 minutes
Thx

又係太多可删嘅字... 仲有好多唔識講嘅問題..
例如..
some individuals believe that the female also should have right to participate in national security

the female << 唔洗the.. 加上我會用番women
right to 應該用 the right to
also should 嗰到我都唔識改.. 不過我會成句改.. 咁開頭呢2句好似唔太夾..
用nowadays 開頭好似好怪..怪我大約會咁開頭.. (獻下醜)

Historically, the army (navy etc) were an occupation predominantly for man,

下面 humans are various from one to each other.. 又係好多唔需要嘅字.. 同埋唔會咁用..
直接..
every human being is different from one another..

自己都好耐無 *真* 用英文

replies.msg:
返工日日睇
其實new york times 同washington post麻麻, not my cup of tea
精簡唔夠其他精簡, 精彩又唔夠tabloid黎

同上篇一樣問題 - 累贅

除咗句式問題，仲有係vocab 唔夠，所以要用多幾隻字去講好簡單嘅野

另外係articles, 好多 the 其實係唔需要

Content 方面其他巴絲都有講過，唔夠深入、唔夠supporting

睇多啲readings, 除咗學vocab, 仲可以睇人地嘅句式點寫，內容點分段。睇嘅時候可以讀埋出黎訓練語感

加油

There are still some women who are extremely gifted in sports and possess strong bodies allowing them to endure densely military training.

所以其他人都可以
好冇說服力

replies.msg:
都get到嘅，係有啲word choice 可以好啲

To be a soldier, it requires a high standard of physical strength.
> Being a soldier requires a high standard of physical strength.
It 喺呢度用錯咗，如果真係要用it 呢個虛詞，應該係 “It requires a high standard of physical strength to become a soldier"

In term of biological views, men are always stronger than women...
> In general, men are biologically stronger than women
Always 係 at all times 嘅意思，即係話男人幾時都強過女人
應該用in general/generally， 指男人一般都強過女人

humans are various from one to each other.
> Human physique varies / Humans vary in fitness / Humans differ from each other
various 好少咁用，一般放noun前

Opting out the whole women from servicing in the army...
> Excluding women from serving in the army...
Opt out 係選擇退出嘅意思. whole係指整體/完整的一個，你可以google下whole同all嘅分別
Service as a verb 好少咁用

Being the navy or the air force soldiers, it requires a calm mind...
> Being in the navy or air force requires a calm mind….
Same problem

In a certain extent, women always perform better in emergency incidents.
> Women can perform as well as men in emergency incidents.
用護士個point唔係好啱logic, 樓上都有講，護士大多女人唔代表女人更叻處理突發
如果真係想講mental ability，個logic應該係講女人係好多需要mental ability嘅職業一樣做得好好，所以女人心理上一樣可以有上戰場嘅能力， 應該平等選核。

另外除咗capability, 唔畀女人參軍可能有其他原因, e.g. stereotyping/ privacy /女性身體嘅limitation 等，都可以explore下。

up mud 9
已經跟蹤左樓主 等佢百屌成才

仲有種感覺係唔識自己改自己既錯

唔似數學有answers 只要明白步驟就可以理解，錯處好快可以諗到

語文側無固定既答案
十個人描述同一件事都可以有十種演繹

點解唔可以用依個字 寫法唔好 我reading真係無難度 但一寫就知唔得 好多字都唔可以係三十分內嘔出黎

似未建立到一種條件反射 一落筆就好順咁去 好似彈琴咁 你有一段彈衰左 你可以重複一段先 練到熟 再落下一段
但作文好似無得咁做

有啲位用always畀人一種先入為主嘅感覺 你寫緊argumentative essay會唔太好 比如第二段話men are always stronger than woman 但下面又話有啲女人又可以好大隻 咁就有啲怪
另一個問題就係argument嘅說服力
你第二段頭講physical ability 係對士兵重要，點解重要吖 可以講多少少說服人 而唔係淨係話男人大隻過女人 咁會令文章個焦點集中錯嘅地方

replies.msg:
同意
作者嘅stance係‘無論男人女人，符合到要求就要畀機會佢'
所以第二段嘅寫法應該係
- 軍中體能好重要
- phsically 男人的確一般強過女人
- 但係其實都有女人體能好好
- 所以唔應該只用性別去評估一個人嘅physical ability （係爭咗呢句）
- 無論男人女人都要公平選拔

祝樓主考7-8

無數字數 狂寫6左
其他7.5 8.5 8
